Title: 🎬 #Ukrainian airborne assault troops footage in #Kursk, from the...
Description: #Ukrainian airborne assault troops footage in #Kursk, from the 80th and 82nd DShV, showing the first crossing of the border and surrender of #Russian checkpoint guards, as well as further operations in Kurk as well as reportedly the downing of a Ka-52 that took place on the 8th of August. @ourwarstodaySource: t.me/ua_dshv Video is too big Video is too big

Title: 🎬🖼 After #Ukrainian forces destroyed the Seim bridge in the Glu...
Description: After #Ukrainian forces destroyed the Seim bridge in the Glushkovsky district of #Kursk yesterday, cutting off logistics for reportedly over half a thousand Russian troops in Glushkovo – now today #Russian forces have apparently constructed two pontoon bridges nearby. Map via M0Nstas on Twitter. @ourwarstoday

Title: 🎬 A #Ukrainian naval drone is taken out with small arms fire by ...
Description: A #Ukrainian naval drone is taken out with small arms fire by #Russian forces off the coast of #Crimea, reportedly today. @ourwarstoday
